TF037825-ARGENTINA - ADVISORY PANEL,TF056327-PHRD-TIMOR-LESTE: ENERGY
            SERVICES DEVIVERY PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
The objectives of the Energy Services
            Delivery Project are to stabilize the power services in
            Dili, by restoring or improving operational efficiency,
            reliability, safety and availability of the power supply,
            and to promote long-term sustainability of the power sector.
            The borrower has also requested an extension of the grant
            closing date by six months from December 31, 2011 to June
            30, 2012 to allow enough time for completion of the
            rehabilitation and upgrading component of the project. This
            restructuring paper covers the extension of grant closing
            date. This will be the first extension of the grant's
            closing date. The borrower has submitted a satisfactory
            action plan for completion of the remaining activities
            within the six months extension period.
